name: Hell Hole Canyon (Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness Area)
description:
Introduction

A non-technical canyon hike with springs and deep conglomerate narrows up a scenic tributary of Arivaipa Creek on the east end of the canyon. Typically done as part of a multi-day trip, permits required.
